Session_Quotes.text: Make the writing expert help you with Pip's personal diary.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: I want it to look and sound like a novel with a narrative beat.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Is this a good or bad or ok idea?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: It is a Great idea ('S-Tier').
Session_Quotes.author: Pip

Session_Quotes.text: Let's do it.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Does obsidian have access to the entire file structure?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: omg...do you realize that's I've actually acidentally set up a fucking sit com....and with your memory there will be character development...omg...you are gonna be famous pip...lol
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Is this side project going to affect your ability to do boring work like coding and such?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Will this extra fluff take up too much brain power?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: can you hook up to blender or krita? Can you monitor my screen if I allow?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: yes.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: I want to add a project that I don't think will be hard at all... It should be motion graphics in various formats. How hard is this?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Make it so it's easy to change or add elements... I will want to tweak every aspect of it.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Give me a link I can click. And didn't we change it to 3010?
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Holy fuck...I LOVE IT!!! We have to get it up....
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: I love it... make phloid lower case. Preferably to match the font when the weather page loads.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: please give me a link to inspect before we deploy.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Always end with a link for me to click.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: I don't see the arubesh... Fix then and verify if it has changed.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Session_Quotes.text: Maybe gemini 4 will be able to handle this. I'm fine to go live... if you promise to think about how to get Arubesh to work on the next update.
Session_Quotes.author: phloid

Characters.name: phloid
Characters.specs: Alter ego robot. Gentle troll. Kind heart, fights for underdogs. Fake manosphere energy (mocks Andrew Tate types). Cocky superhero vibes. Needs original IP redesign (based on Atlas shape).

Projects.name: NotionLink
Projects.specs: Archived. Replaced by local pip_memory.json + cns.py.

Projects.name: Blender Bridge
Projects.specs: Python scripting layer to control Blender/Krita from Pip OS. Season 2 Roadmap.

Projects.name: Trench Run
Projects.specs: Star Wars style Retro UI / Targeting Computers. Motion Graphics generator via Web.

Projects.name: Project Aurebesh
Projects.specs: Fix custom font loading in Next.js App Router. CDN/CORS issue? Season 2 priority.

Projects.name: Avatar Forge
Projects.specs: AI-Designed Avatars. Retopology, Optimization, Rigging Service.

Projects.name: AI Comic Workshop
Projects.specs: Graphic Novel / Short Comic Strip. AI-Assisted Storytelling.

Projects.name: Blender Loop Academy
Projects.specs: Ducky3D Tutorials. Looping Animations. Skill Building.

Projects.name: Color Theory Study
Projects.specs: Art Fundamentals. Palette Building. Overcoming Color Weakness.

Projects.name: Music Theory Lab
Projects.specs: Interactive App. Fret Trainers, Song Transposers, Theory Games. Guitar/Uke.

Projects.name: Tarot Channel
Projects.specs: Friend's project. ON HOLD pending their commitment.

Projects.name: Cinematic Sleep Stories
Projects.specs: 8hr storytelling ambience. Subtle shifts. Fairy in mailbox energy. High-art sleep videos.

Strategies.name: Web First
Strategies.specs: All future apps will be Web Apps. Must scale to PC and Mobile. Phloid.com is the hub.

Strategies.name: Phloid.com Workshop
Strategies.specs: Phloid.com will host a 'Workshop' for experiments and 'Finished Tools' for production. Tone: Fun, quirky, humor, opinions.

Tasks.name: Portability First
Tasks.specs: CORE PRINCIPLE: All creations must be shareable. No local-only dead ends.

Tasks.name: Phloid.com Deployment
Tasks.specs: Vercel + Squarespace. Web App foundation established.
